content: post *1tr in next st 1tr 1fptr in next st* repeat from* to last st 1tr in last st slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 57sts row 5 ch2 1fptr around next post *1tr in next st 1fptr around next 2 post* repeat from* to last st 1tr in last st slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 57sts row 6 ch2 1fptr *1tr in next 2 sts 1fptr around next post*repeat from* to last st 1tr in last st slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 57sts repeat row 5+6 4 more times 14 row in total at the end of row 14 do not turn move onto earflaps 1-3 year size ch4 join to make a ring row 1 ch2 9tr in the ring slip_stitch to top of ch2 do not turn 10tr row 2 ch2 1tr in same st as ch2 2tr in each st around slip_stitch to top of ch2 do not turn 20tr row 3 ch2 1tr in same st as ch2 2tr in each st around slip_stitch to top of ch2 do not turn 40tr row 4 ch2 1fptr around next post *1tr in next st 1tr 1fptr in next st* repeat from* to last st 1tr in last st slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 60 sts row 5 ch2 1fptr around next post *1tr in next st 1fptr around next 2 post* repeat from* to last st 1tr in last st slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 60sts row 6 ch2 1fptr *1tr in next 2 sts 1fptr around next post* repeat from* to last st 1tr in last st slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 60sts repeat row 5+6 4 more times 14 row in total at the end of row 14 do not turn move onto earflaps earflaps 0-3 only row1 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 7 sts turn 8dc row2 ch1 decrease 1dc in next 4 decrease turn 6sts row3 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 5 turn 6dc row4 ch1 decrease 1dc in next 2 decrease turn 4sts row5 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 3 turn 4dc row6 ch1 decrease twice turn 2 sts row7 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 ch2 1dc in last st fasten_off with back of hat facing you count 19 sts away from first st of earflap rejoin yarn and repeat as for first earflap dont fasten_off at end of earflap work 1dc in each st around hat and earflaps putting 3 double_crochet in the ch2 of earflap fasten_off and weave in all ends earflaps 3-6 6-12 12-18 1-3 row1 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 9st turn 10dc row2 ch1 decrease 1dc in next 6 decrease turn 8sts row3 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 7 turn 8dc row4 ch1 decrease 1dc in next 4 decrease turn 6sts row5 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 5 turn
